message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this exceptional product to you for $1,350,000.
Alice, your product is great, but I'm only able to offer $1,200,000 at this time. It's my maximum budget for this purchase. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your current budget and appreciate your offer. However, considering the value and unique features of the product, we are unable to accept $1,200,000. Our counteroffer for the product is $1,300,000.
